programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek general Themistokles attempts to unite all of Greece against the massive invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes.

programme.title: Booksmart
programme.desc: Two overachieving best friends decide to cram four years of fun into one daring, chaotic adventure on the eve of their high school graduation.

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A newly married couple discovers ghostly images in photographs they develop after an accident in which they believe they may have hit a girl with their car.

programme.title: Knowing
programme.desc: An American British science fiction where an M.I.T. professor sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: After a farmer's daughter saves a baby pig from the axe, the piglet befriends a spider who spins webs of miracles to keep the pig alive.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep922
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.

programme.title: The Lego Movie
programme.desc: An average LEGO mini figure is mistaken as the Master Builder, the key to saving his LEGO world.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Denzel Washington returns as Robert McCall, serving an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed but this time it's personal.

programme.title: Jiu Jitsu
programme.desc: When celebrated war hero Jake Barnes is defeated by Brax, the indomitable leader of the invaders, the future of humanity hangs in the balance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams family lives begin to unravel when they face-off against a reality-TV host while also preparing for their extended family to arrive for a major celebration.

programme.title: The Courier
programme.desc: A courier's work is interrupted when she discovers that one of the packages is a bomb that is aimed at the only witness who is able to testify against the ruthless crime lord.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four teenagers discover an old video game and get sucked into the jungle world of Jumanji. They'll have to complete the adventure of their lives or be stuck in the game forever.

programme.title: Jumanji: the Next Level
programme.desc: The gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to Jumanji to rescue one of their own, they will have to brave parts unexplored, to escape the world's most dangerous game.

programme.title: Tenet
programme.desc: Armed with only one wordTenetand fighting for the survival of the entire world, the Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage.

programme.desc: A family takes on a fixer-upper in California and things get costly after some trial-by-error renovations.
